head_commit.message:
Optimise GitHub Actions workflows (#199)

* Remove setup-vulkan from install-dependencies
* Rename install-dependencies to install-tools
* Make script for installing tool packages on both Linux and Windows
* Support installing ccache and ninja from GitHub releases
* List installed packages along with the install durations
* Remove ninja dependency by using make for Linux jobs
* Download gcc problem matcher manually
* Detect if clang requires extra repository
* Install clang from llvm apt repository if required version not
available
* Move vcpkg install options into Build-Packages workflow
* Agressively delete old ccache caches to avoid consuming the quota
* Trigger Build-Packages workflow on pull requests
